name: .STREAMDECKAUDIO
summary: Learn about .STREAMDECKAUDIO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use the Elgato Stream Deck's associated software to open STREAMDECKAUDIO files and associate them with buttons on your Stream Deck. To do so:
Open the Stream Deck app (with your Stream Deck connected to your PC).
Drag the Play Audio action onto a key.
In the Action Property Inspector (which appears below your Stream Deck profile), select the Choose... button.
Browse to and select your STREAMDECKAUDIO file.
Then, finish filling out the fields in the Action Property Inspector. After you do, you'll be able to play your STREAMDECKAUDIO file from your Elgato Stream Deck.

You can use Stream Deck Audio Deobfuscator (Windows) to convert STREAMDECKAUDIO files to the .WAV (WAVE Audio) format, and vice versa. Note that Stream Deck Audio Deobfuscator is an unofficial, third-party application.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .streamdeckaudio file in Elgato Stream Deck
images.caption: STREAMDECKAUDIO file open in Elgato Stream Deck
